title: (x) "Royaltyfree.it - Nuove promozioni!" cut & paste tech sans - DIN {Yves}
content:
… and I need to identify the font in the image below.  
Even similar ones are warmly welcome.  
Thank you in advance!

Giacomo  
 [http://giacomocesana.wordpress.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20071019054615/http:/giacomocesana.wordpress.com/ "http://giacomocesana.wordpress.com")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font elio.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20071019054615/http:/typophile.com/files/font%20elio.png) | 12.77 KB |

 [‹ CalArts logo wide sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20071019054615/http:/typophile.com/node/33887 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Downtown Deli - Quicksilver (Neon Lights) {Chesh, Mark S} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071019054615/http:/typophile.com/node/2807 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Giacomo Cesana

comments.content:
[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-dax/light/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071019054615/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-dax/light/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-dax/light/")

Dax Light is similar but less rounded

Dax light was one of the first to come to my mind.  
We gotta dig deeper!

momo  
––  
All Good Cretins Go To Heaven

\>All Good Cretins Go To Heaven  
Ramones?  
\>Suspect Device  
StiffLittleFingers?

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/madtype/variable/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071019054615/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/madtype/variable/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/madtype/variable/")  
At least it’s close.

Jan,  
if you were as good at finding fonts as you are in punk rock music we’d have a solution for my font request!  
thank you by the way, your font is pretty close.

momo  
––  
All Good Cretins Go To Heaven
I think this is probably not custom because it looks familiar to me.

I’m not expecting anyone to believe me, but I’m firmly convinced that a slash-happy designer had his/her way with [FF DIN Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20071019054615/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_din_light/&sample_text=royaltyfree.it%20-%20nuove%20promozioni!&sample_size=24).

Now I’m convinced too: it’s FF DIN Light after some heavy surgery.

momo  
––  
All Good Cretins Go To Heaven
